name: Hill King
description:
Left player jump: "A"
Right player jump: "L"

Press and hold for longer jump. You'll jump in the direction that you are pointing. While in mid-air you can tap the jump button again to fly in the direction you are facing. This can be used to knock your opponent off the hill.

Hill King is a simple yet fun and addictive split-screen game that is inspired by something we've all played at school when we were younger; King of the hill. I'm sure there are many variants of this activity - but this variant is hopefully neither of them.

This game is made in just a few days but I'm considering extending it with more characters, levels and more if people like it :) Have fun!
